channel.title: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW
channel.description:
as most of u know WOW (world of warcraft) is a game that is most poplular mmorpg game on the planet cost 15 dollars a month
over 9 million people across the world play this game.
it is a long lne of games called warcraft for 1994-2007 and has continous update that improve gaming
comment what you think about the game
personaly i played for years sucked up my life quit =) best thing i ever did!

item.title: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

Guild Wars = boring
Guild Wars 2 = will own WoW

WoW is still fun though if you have an assload of time on your hands then go for it

Read full topic

item.source: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW

item.title: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Dizzy, post:21, topic:161520”][quote author=I Br3ndan I link=topic=219823.msg1928979#msg1928979 date=1197599227]
It’s good. Although, apprently it’s the worst game to become addicted to. I’ve seen alot of videos on YouTube of recovering addicts who regret wasting alot of time playing World of Warcraft. That isn’t to say you could use your time carefully and wisely though, spending around 1 hour a day or so on the actual game itself as a pose to 5 or 6.
[/quote]

A professional player? you act as if it is a damn job.

The best game to get addicted to would be Counter-Strike. Main reason is because they have tournaments for this game and I mean LOTS of them too. Great way to make money if you become a professional CS player. The downside would be you go crazy and gain a thirst for blood then pull a Virginia Tech.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.source: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW

item.title: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

I Br3ndan I:

It’s good. Although, apprently it’s the worst game to become addicted to. I’ve seen alot of videos on YouTube of recovering addicts who regret wasting alot of time playing World of Warcraft. That isn’t to say you could use your time carefully and wisely though, spending around 1 hour a day or so on the actual game itself as a pose to 5 or 6.

The best game to get addicted to would be Counter-Strike. Main reason is because they have tournaments for this game and I mean LOTS of them too. Great way to make money if you become a professional CS player. The downside would be you go crazy and gain a thirst for blood then pull a Virginia Tech.

Read full topic

item.source: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW

item.title: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:16, topic:161520”][quote author=juju link=topic=219823.msg1919904#msg1919904 date=1197147692]
GG

I’ve heard its boring once you reach the highest level though.

er, what? endgame stuff is the best/most interesting part…

WoW, is a good game but makes me angry. Billions of addicts with their allegiance to their faction “0fmge alliance sux” “rofl h0rd3 sux00rs”

its a damn game and people make a big deal about it. the game also fucked my cousin in the ass with a piano string. he didnt go to college to play that stupid time consuming game.

Your cousin is weak.
[/quote]

Mentally, yes he is.[/quote]

I’m starting to think my brother has the same problem too. Although he only gets to play around once a week because he doesn’t have his own computer, I think he’s very much addicted to the game. I believe it has its part in helping my brother drop out of school, because he got into a fight with my mom once about his future and education and he was talking about that all he needed in his life was WoW and he’ll be set. Thankfully he isn’t so crazy about the game as he used to be, but I still see some faults about him playing the game.

Read full topic

item.title: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

I think the game is great. The people who play are so much better than runescape noobs. I’ve heard its boring once you reach the highest level though.

I’d recommend trying the 10 day free trial on www.worldofwarcraft.com or www.wow-europe.com .

You can’t possibly experience 1/10 the fun in a 10 day trial but it is definitely worth a try.

Read full topic
item.source: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW

item.title: WOW world of warcraft good game or dumb? what u need to know bout WOW
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

I bought, attempted to play, brother hijacked it, I got pissed, I played only cuz I jacked it back, got bored, quit, 1 year later started playing again, now have level 10 Blood elf paladin, STFU…

I think the game is some what cool, but I do think it is beatin’ by Final Fantasy (sorry, but BEST RPG EVER). And I also like RuneScape better than WoW. I only play it on some of my free time. Other than that I usually would play CS, TF2, Halo 3, or RS2 with my free time.

I’m thinking of trying out Hellgate London. It looks like a kickass game.

Read full topic
